card.name: Junk for Sale
card.description: Look at 2 3-{{COST}} monsters (max. {{RARITY:EPIC}}) and add one to your hand with 0 {{COST}}. {{KW:DELAY}}: Add a {{CARD:772|1}} to your hand if you have none.
